text: Pogonocherus dimidiatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Blessig in 1873. It is known from Russia, China, North Korea, South Korea, and Japan.BioLib.cz - Pogonocherus dimidiatus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1873
title: Pogonocherus dimidiatus
